sentences.sentence: He has already caused apoplexy with his books on class and on war.
sentences.translation: 他已经因为自己关于阶级和战争的书而触发了众怒。

sentences.sentence: CT appearance of glioblastoma multiforme was low density image, intratumorally apoplexy was high density image.
sentences.translation: 多形性胶质母细胞瘤 CT 表现为低密度影，瘤内卒中表现为高密度。

sentences.sentence: Urine microproteins increasing in ischemic apoplexy are relative to stages of hypertension, serum lipid level and types of lipid dysbolism.
sentences.translation: 缺血性中风后尿微量蛋白的增加与高血压的阶段，血清脂质水平和脂质代谢障碍的类型有关。
